name: U.S. EPA Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) - Enforcement Case Search

requests.name: Enforcement Case Summary Report Search
requests.description: The get_case_report service endpoint returns a complex object of civil enforcement case details based on the provided case id.

queryParams.description: Case Number. Enter the case number identifier to retrieve the case report.

Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

requests.name: Enforcement Case Search
requests.description: The get_cases service end point searches for civil enforcement and criminal cases based on the provided selection criteria.

queryParams.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

requests.name: Enforcement Criminal Case Summary Report Search
requests.description: The get_crcase_report service end point returns a complex object of criminal case detials based on the provided criminal case id.

queryParams.description: Case Number. Enter the case number identifier to retrieve the case report.

Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

requests.name: Enforcement Case Download Data Service
requests.description: Based on the QID obtained from a get_cases query, return a comma sepated vaule (CSV) file of the cases found.

queryParams.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

requests.name: Enforcement Case Map Service
requests.description: The purpose of the GET_MAP service is to display facility coordinates and facility clusters related to a get_cases query. Currently, the maximum number of coordinates returned is 500. GET_MAP performs automatic clustering at the state, county, and zip code levels to maximize the number of coordinates returned.

queryParams.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

requests.name: Enforcement Case Paginated Results Service
requests.description: GET_QID is passed with a query ID corresponding to a previously run get_cases query. It then returns a CASES object containing all matching cases. The main purpose of GET_QID is for large querysets that contain multiple pages (responsesets) of output. GET_QID allows for pagination and for the selection and sorting of columns.

queryParams.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

requests.name: Enforcement Case Metadata Service
requests.description: Returns the JSON Object Name and ColumnId for usage with the qcolumns parameter for get_cases endpoint.

queryParams.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

requests.name: ECHO ICIS Law Sections Lookup Service
requests.description: Returns the ICIS Law Section Descriptions.

queryParams.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.
